channel.title: PokeScript
channel.description:
The language used to program pokemon ROMS.
I learned a bit of it, here would be a basic talking script:
[code=PokeScript]#org $script lock faceplayer message $question $question 1 = Are you gay? boxset 5 compare 0x800D 0x0001 if 0x01 goto $yes message $no $no 1 = Fuck, too bad. boxset 6 release end
#org $yes message $yes1 $yes1 1 = You are? You wanna buttsex? boxset 6 release end[/code]
I don't have any pictures, mainly because I am a lazy asshole; and there is a compiler for this but it has to be installed.

item.title: PokeScript
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

The language used to program pokemon ROMS.

I learned a bit of it, here would be a basic talking script:

[code=PokeScript]#org $script
lock
faceplayer
message $question
$question 1 = Are you gay?
boxset 5
compare 0x800D 0x0001
if 0x01 goto $yes
message $no
$no 1 = Fuck, too bad.
boxset 6
release
end

#org $yes
message $yes1
$yes1 1 = You are? You wanna buttsex?
boxset 6
release
end[/code]

I don’t have any pictures, mainly because I am a lazy asshole; and there is a compiler for this but it has to be installed.

Read full topic
